name: BAA Training Vietnam
about: BAA Training Vietnam, located in Ho Chi Minh City, is a CAAV-approved Aviation Training Organisation (ATO) designed to serve the Asia-Pacific region with advanced aviation training solutions. As part of the Avia Solutions Group, the largest ACMI provider globally, BAA Training Vietnam offers comprehensive training programs including Ab Initio, Type Rating, and Airline Crew Training. The facility features a 3,000 mÂ² training center with state-of-the-art full flight simulators for Airbus A320 CEO, A320 NEO, and Boeing 737 NG. Additional training devices include APT and fire simulators. With EASA-quality standards, BAA Training Vietnam is equipped to train pilots and crew members to the highest industry standards, ensuring professional flight crew members for airlines across the region.
